duties_responsibilities.duty: Monitor and replenish physical inventory levels in Supermarkets and WIP areas based on process triggers.
Perform inventory transactions in SAP for material movements into WIP areas.
Coordinate with Main Warehouse for replenishment of supermarkets based on material moves into WIP.
Replenish non-inventory areas such as gloves, bonnets, and supporting inventories in designated locations throughout the cleanroom.
Perform put-away activities for inbound materials to the operations non-inventory (2-bin) and move outbound materials from WIP.
Assist with dispositioning of WIP in the NC cage that is approved for scrap and perform physical purge from the cage for disposal.
Review old raw material batches with no movement in SAP.

education_certification.credential: 1+ years' experience in a production/material movement role
